minipaint

Class EditorPaint

  • java.lang.Object
    • minipaint.EditorPaint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class EditorPaint
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
    Classe que serve como intermediador entre a interface grafica e as classes e metodos do programa.
    Since:
    03/2019

    • Constructor Summary

      Construtor do editor.
